home.title: Nodes
home.setExportPath: Double click to set export path

table.nodeIdMiss: The node cannot be edited (reason: node ID is missing)
table.noDeviceConnect: Please connect the device before performing the operation
table.noSelectedNode: No backup nodes are currently selected

backups.waiting: Please wait for the task to be completed
backups.tip: Backup may take a short period of time, are you sure?

nodeModal.backupPathPlaceHolder: Please enter the folder path for backup
nodeModal.backupPathErrorTip: Please enter the correct device backup path, starting and ending with /
nodeModal.exportPathEmpty: Please enter the folder path to export
nodeModal.exportPathErrorTip: Please enter the correct export path, such as E:/backup
nodeModal.exportPathPlaceHolder: If left blank, inherit the parent path
nodeModal.fullTip: Back up all file data of the device without difference comparison (not recommended)
nodeModal.hashModeTip: In the case of the same name, if the file hash value is different, the file on the device will be re-backed up

tips.obtainLatestVersion: Please go to mib release to download the latest version, or contact the author to obtain the latest version download

field.aboutAuthor: Scan QR code to join WeChat group

tour.backupNodeDesc: This is a list of all backup nodes.
tour.addNodeDesc: Click here to add a backup node, and fill in node information as needed.
tour.exportPathDesc: Set a root export path where backup files will be stored.
tour.selectDeviceDesc: Choose the data to be backed up ( the program will automatically select when a device is connected ).
tour.backupDataDesc: Click here to initiate a backup based on your configured nodes.
tour.restoreDataDesc: Move previously backed-up data files back to the device as they are.
